translations: n.（有柄的）大锤；猛烈的打击

sentences.sentence: Toes and fast moving sledgehammers do not make a good mix !
sentences.translation: 脚趾和快速移动大锤不好好组合！

sentences.sentence: It involves bolting iron plates to the walls of tunnels at regular intervals and placing sledgehammers nearby.
sentences.translation: 这种方法是通过在坑道壁上有规律的固定一些铁片，然后在在这些铁片附近放上铁锤。

sentences.sentence: The steep ruggedness of the volcanic terrain made this work very difficult; it required picks, sledgehammers, and a lot of sweat.
sentences.translation: 由于火山地形险峻陡峭，他们的活干得很艰难，十字镐和重锤都要派上用场，而且汗流浃背。
